name: The Frozen Land
description:
The Frozen Land

Made for Mini Jam 124: Warmth
Limitation: Your score serves a purpose.

Tried to make a budget roguelike, sadly I overscoped and ran out of time so I had to cut a bunch of planned content. (scene transitions, more weapons, abilities, enemy types, balancing)

IF YOU FIND BUGS please write a comment!

Goal

Get through all 15 floors and defeat the evil great ice mage boss who froze the entire land to get it to blossom once more!
Buy upgrades after each death by spending tokens equal to you highest score.

Controls

WASD: Move
Left Click: Attack
Q: Heal
